notes: Initial Release
Fixed: Hidden Lat/Lng/Address fields are now cleared when the Address Search input is empty.
Added link to docs
Added releases json for updates
Merged #2 & #3 from https://github.com/cballenar
#2 - Added zoom
#3 - Improved handling of unknown locations
Improved error message display
Added `parts` to the fieldtype output.
Fix #5 via @jripmeester - Fixed Lat / Lng being populated with function, not number.
**Added search and sorting support.**
Added optional Google API Server Key setting
**_WARNING:_** This update will break any map fields that are NOT standalone (global) or in a Matrix field.
- Fixed bug where map would not display correctly when in a secondary tab.
- Added Browser API key setting
- Browser API key can now be accessed in templates
[Improved] The address input automatically updates the map after paste
[Added] Added option to hide the map, leaving only the address input
[Added] Added ability to restrict auto-complete by country, address type, and boundary
[Added] Added `_short` prefix to all parts, returning the short value. **You will need to re-save your entries for this to take effect.**
[Fixed] Fixed map JS erroring when in globals
[Improved] Merged API keys into one
[Added] Added [FeedMe 2](https://sgroup.com.au/plugins/feedme) support! (thanks to @engram-design, #23)
[Added] Added support for [Neo](https://github.com/benjamminf/craft-neo). #21
[Fixed] Fixed when using the address search, locations that are non-specific (i.e. the name of a country) will no longer be forced to be specific.
[Fixed] Fixed 'Unnamed Roads' no longer change to a different unnamed road when the map is re-loaded. #26
[Improved] Disabled scrollwheel on map, #27
[Improved] Details about the selected location are now populated server-side, no more JavaScript shittery! #30
[Improved] Improved locale specific address details #24
[Improved] If the query limit is reached, the map will re-try after 1 second, a maximum of 5 times. #19
[Improved] The address of the map will be returned when output as a string, i.e. `{{ entry.myMapField }}`. #29
[Fixed] Fixed the Lat/Lng inputs not accepting decimals in Chrome #36
[Added] Added alternative Server API key setting #38
[Fixed] Fix maps not saving because of troubles with dots and commas #41 - @Zae
[Fixed] Non-translatable fields now actually donâ€™t translate #43
[Fixed] Added error handling for failed server geocode requests #37
[Improved] You can no longer tap to move the marker on mobile (drag map instead) #33
[Fixed] Added fix for slightly major bug in 1.6.0 that meant any non-translatable fields would stop displaying old data. #44
[Fixed] Fixed bug where some browsers would consider some decimals invalid in the Lat/Lng inputs #46
[Fixed] Fixed `CDbException` when trying to search by invalid location. `mapField.distance` will return `NULL` in this case #48
[Improved] The field is now previewable in the entries table (via @joshuabaker)
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where `SimpleMap_MapModel` `__toString()` would't always return a string
[Improved] Improved the efficiency of the location search query.
[Added] It is now possible to save the field using only an address (useful for saving via the front-end, requires Geocoding)
[Improved] Improved the field's validation
